title: Earthquake Early Warning System Prediction Model Design and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary machine learning concepts and foundational seismology knowledge
context.additional_context: An educational program aimed at enhancing administrators' disaster response system optimization and decision-making capabilities. Requires content optimized for mobile environments.

learning_goals: A neural network-based model can predict the risk of earthquake-prone areas with over 80% accuracy.
Historical earthquake data can be preprocessed and visualized to express spatial analysis results in map form.
A disaster response planning process can be designed based on predictive model results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
